backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining comprehensive healthcare platform types (professionals, hospitals, vendors, NGOs, medical records, research projects) and integrating access control and blob storage mixins for role-based authorization and document management.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three homepage enhancements: Clean Claim Intelligence section with 10-layer validation messaging, Knowledge Board section for regulatory compliance resources, and seamless integration with existing homepage components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including routing, pages (Dashboard, Contact, Careers, Vendors, etc.), components (Chatbot, Navigation, PendingRequestsList), hooks (useQueries), and styling with Royal Teal color scheme and form styling rules.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables for backgrounds, foregrounds, borders, charts, and sidebar components using CSS custom properties.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with viewport meta tag, favicon reference, and root div mounting point for the SPA.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application router setup using TanStack Router with 20+ routes (Home, About, Solutions, Careers, Vendors, AdminDashboard, CleanClaimIntelligence, etc.), QueryClient configuration, InternetIdentity provider, and Toaster for notifications.
frontend/src/components/Chatbot.tsx: AI chatbot component with expandable floating interface, message history, contextual responses about healthcare services (RCM, technology, network, careers, vendors, ambulance, NGOs), and contact information including info@aihealthzon.com.
React form component using react-hook-form for submitting demo booking requests with fields for name, hospital, designation, mobile, email, city, and message. Handles form validation, submission via useSaveDemoBookingRequest hook, and displays success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying AI Health Zon branding, contact email (info@aihealthzon.com), social media links (Facebook, X, LinkedIn, Instagram), and navigation links organized in columns for Quick Links, Services, and Legal sections.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout wrapper component that renders Navigation at top, Outlet for page content in the middle, Footer at bottom, and a floating WhatsAppButton. Provides consistent structure across all pages.
frontend/src/components/MemberDetailView: Dialog component displaying detailed member profiles for healthcare professionals, vendors, or NGOs with contact information, professional details, specialties/services, and action buttons for WhatsApp and email communication.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with logo, desktop/mobile menus, authentication button (login/logout via Internet Identity), and links to all major platform pages. Highlights active route and manages mobile menu state.
frontend/src/components/PendingRequestsL: List component that displays pending requests (professional, vendor, ambulance, or NGO) using RequestDetailCard components. Shows loading state and empty state when no requests exist.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Onboarding form component for new users to create their profile by selecting account type (hospital, professional, vendor, NGO) and entering their name. Submits profile data via useSaveCallerUserProfile hook.
frontend/src/components/RequestDetailCar: Displays detailed information for registration requests (healthcare professionals, vendors, NGOs, ambulances) with expand/collapse functionality and approve/reject actions. Includes contact information display, document downloads, and WhatsApp/email integration.
frontend/src/components/StakeholderDetai: Modal dialog component that displays comprehensive details for stakeholders (hospitals, vendors, NGOs) including contact information, verification status, and action buttons for WhatsApp, email, and website links.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppButton.t: Fixed floating button component that opens WhatsApp chat with a hardcoded phone number (918696766966) in a new window.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that manages the backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication, automatically recreating the actor when identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login/logout functionality, managing AuthClient lifecycle and identity state with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralized collection of React Query hooks for all backend API calls including user profiles, admin checks, registration submissions, pending requests, and approval/rejection mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, enterprise color scheme (Royal Teal/White), form styling, and responsive design utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClientProvider for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication context.
frontend/src/pages/AboutUs.tsx: About Us page displaying company mission, vision, values, and team information with a hero section, CTA buttons, and a demo booking modal. Includes cards with icons for trust, excellence, collaboration, and innovation values.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard for reviewing and managing stakeholder registration requests (healthcare professionals, vendors, NGOs, ambulances) with tabs, summary cards, and pending request counts. Includes admin access verification and displays pending requests using PendingRequestsList component.
frontend/src/pages/AmbulanceServices.tsx: Ambulance service registration page with a form for submitting service details including name, contact, location (with PIN code auto-lookup), and service types (emergency, ICU, event). Displays service benefits and handles form submission with admin approval workflow.
frontend/src/pages/Blog.tsx: Empty blog page component with no content.
frontend/src/pages/BlogArticle.tsx: Empty blog article page component with no content.
frontend/src/pages/Careers.tsx: Careers page with a registration form for healthcare professionals to submit applications including role selection, experience, location (with PIN code auto-lookup), contact details, and CV upload. Handles form submission with upload progress tracking and admin approval workflow.
frontend/src/pages/CaseStudies.tsx: Case studies page with hero section, empty state message indicating content coming soon, and multiple CTAs for booking demos. Includes a demo booking modal dialog.
frontend/src/pages/CleanClaimIntelligenc: Product page showcasing Clean Claim Intelligence with nine validation layers (patient identity, pre-authorization, clinical validity, medical coding, billing consistency, documentation, claim lifecycle, fraud analytics, financial accuracy) presented in an accordion format. Includes demo booking functionality and detailed feature lists for each validation layer.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Contact page component displaying hero section, contact information cards (phone, email, location), multiple CTAs for scheduling calls/demos, and a chatbot. Includes a modal dialog for demo booking form.
frontend/src/pages/HealthcareSupportSyst: Healthcare support system page displaying categorized support services (workforce, emergency, diagnostics, pharmacy, home healthcare, mental health, vendors, NGOs) with cards, icons, images, and navigation to specific category pages.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Homepage component featuring an auto-rotating hero carousel, why-choose-us section with benefits, solutions cards (RCM, technology, connecting platform), metrics display, and demo booking modal with hash-based navigation support.
frontend/src/pages/KnowledgeBoard.tsx: Knowledge board page providing comprehensive information about hospital licensing and regulatory compliance in India, featuring hero section, accordion-based content organization, and links to external research publications with demo consultation CTA.
frontend/src/pages/Members.tsx: Members directory page displaying approved healthcare professionals, vendors, and NGOs in a grid layout with filtering, member type badges, and a detail view modal. Fetches data using useGetAllApprovedMembers hook.
frontend/src/pages/NetworkDirectory.tsx: Displays a searchable directory of healthcare stakeholders (hospitals, vendors, NGOs) with filtering by category and location, and a detail view modal for selected entities.
frontend/src/pages/NetworkMap.tsx: Shows a visual map-based view of the healthcare network with statistics on total stakeholders, cities covered, and a grid of locations grouped by city.
frontend/src/pages/NgoListing.tsx: Provides an NGO registration form with PIN code-based auto-fill for location and displays a filterable list of registered NGOs awaiting admin approval.
frontend/src/pages/Onboarding.tsx: Presents a multi-phase onboarding guide for the healthcare revenue cycle, covering 10 phases from patient registration through reporting and analytics with navigation between phases.
frontend/src/pages/PatientJourney.tsx: Placeholder page for a future patient journey document library feature, currently showing a 'Coming Soon' message.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicy.tsx: Static page displaying the platform's privacy policy with sections on data collection, usage, sharing, security, and user rights.
frontend/src/pages/RefundPolicy.tsx: Displays a static refund policy page with sections covering eligibility, request process, processing time, non-refundable items, and cancellations. Uses Card components to present the policy content with dynamic last-updated date.
frontend/src/pages/Solutions.tsx: Presents RCM (Revenue Cycle Management) solutions with features, problem statements, impact metrics, and FAQs. Includes a demo booking modal and uses accordions for FAQ display.
frontend/src/pages/TermsConditions.tsx: Displays static terms and conditions page covering acceptance of terms, use of services, user responsibilities, intellectual property, liability limitations, and modifications. Uses Card components with dynamic last-updated date.
frontend/src/pages/Vendors.tsx: Vendor registration page with form for submitting vendor details including category, products, and location. Auto-fills city/state from PIN code lookup and displays existing vendors list.
frontend/src/utils/pinCodeLookup.ts: Utility function that validates and looks up Indian PIN codes using the India Post API to retrieve city and state information. Returns structured result with success/error status.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing. Includes sessionStorage persistence and parameter cleanup functionality.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme extensions including enterprise color palette, container settings, font families, animations, and plugins for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state file for AI Health Zon tracking three existing homepage features (Clean Claim Intelligence section, Knowledge Board section, and seamless integration) and one pending feature request to upgrade the homepage. Uses schema version 1.0.0 with instant clarification mode.
